publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-113 Rhona Brankin: Amicus Scottish Cup Final—That the Parliament congratulates Hibernian Ladies Football Club on its success in the Amicus Scottish Cup Final, completing a day of women’s and girls’ football at Almondvale Stadium; notes that women’s and girls’ football is one of the fastest growing sports in the world; urges the development of links between schools and local clubs to provide new opportunities at every level of the game in Scotland, and welcomes the involvement of Amicus in supporting equality in sport as well as in the workplace.

S2M-113 Rhona Brankin: Amicus Scottish Cup Final—That the Parliament congratulates Hibernian Ladies Football Club on its success in the Amicus Scottish Cup Final, completing a day of women’s and girls’ football at Almondvale Stadium; notes that women’s and girls’ football is one of the fastest growing sports in the world; urges the development of links between schools and local clubs to provide new opportunities at every level of the game in Scotland, and welcomes the involvement of Amicus in supporting equality in sport as well as in the workplace.
S2M-113 Amicus Scottish Cup Final (lodged on 5 June 2003) Bill Butler*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Johann Lamont*, Mr John Home Robertson*, Cathie Craigie*, Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-113 Amicus Scottish Cup Final (lodged on 5 June 2003) Helen Eadie*, Karen Gillon*, Mike Watson*, Pauline McNeill*, Christine May*, Susan Deacon*
S2M-113 Amicus Scottish Cup Final (lodged on 5 June 2003) Trish Godman*, Donald Gorrie*, Mr Richard Baker*
S2M-113 Amicus Scottish Cup Final (lodged on 5 June 2003) Elaine Smith*
S2M-113 Amicus Scottish Cup Final (lodged on 5 June 2003) Cathy Peattie*
S2M-113 Amicus Scottish Cup Final (lodged on 5 June 2003) Marlyn Glen*
